description: ff. 109. 215 x 160; 150 x 115 mm. 23 lin. autograph, Ṣafar 878. Brockelmann, GAL, S II, 130 (7a: no. 3) - abridg. of his al-Inṣāf min taṣḥīḥ mā aṭlaqa al-Shaykh al-Muwaffaq fī al-Muqniʻ min al-khilāf (cf. Sakhāwī, al-Ḍawʼ al-lāmiʻ (1353-55 H.), V, 226, lin. 22). Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى علم ووفق
author: Mardāwī, ʻAlī ibn Sulaymān, 1414 or 1415-1480 or 1481
title: al-Tanqīh al-mushbiʻ fī taḥrīr aḥkam al-Muqniʻ.
creator: Mardāwī, ʻAlī ibn Sulaymān, 1414 or 1415-1480 or 1481
subject: Ibn Qudāmah, Muwaffaq al-Dīn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad, 1147-1223—Muqniʻ.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
